content: As you make your way through the Webbed Hollow, you'll start to work toward the bottom of the area, past the Cliff of Oblivion. This is where you can find the Relief of the Fallen Loong, and Yellow Loong waiting at the edge of the nearby cliff.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Secret_Bosses_in_Black_Myth_Wukong.md', within the main section titled 'Secret Bosses in Chapter 4', specifically from the subsection 'Yellow Loong'.
The content is as follows:
As you make your way through the Webbed Hollow, you'll start to work toward the bottom of the area, past the Cliff of Oblivion. This is where you can find the Relief of the Fallen Loong, and Yellow Loong waiting at the edge of the nearby cliff.
